SELECT ID , NAME , IS_ADMIN AS isAdmin , CONTENTS , CREATE_TIME as createTime , VIEWS , CATEGORY_ID as categoryId , USER_ID as userId , FILE_ID as fileId , UPDATE_TIME as updateTime FROM POST WHERE 1=1
AND NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
AND CONTENTS LIKE CONCAT('%',#{contents},'%')
AND category_id = #{categoryId}
ORDER BY create_time DESC
ORDER BY create_time ASC
ORDER BY CATEGORY_ID
